resources.string: Hello, my name is Sandy. Before we chow down together, I have to get to know you. Touch my buns to proceed

string-array.name: tutorial_questions
string-array.item: Okay smartie, is this a sandwich?
I don\'t care if you think you could fit this in your mouth\; is it a sandwich?
Sandwich, or not sandwich? That is the question.

resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
This is an intro message I\'ve included because they voices told me to.
Watch where you put that finger. I said touch my buns.
I know who you are and I\'ve seen where you sleep. Do not lie to me again.
Some people just don\'t appreciate the Chip Butty. Deleting
That was an ice cream SANDWICH, but I\'ll respect your prejudice - deleting
